avoid_these.content: Stay away from animals that might eat you!

can_make_own.content: You can also make your own level.

collected_bunch_food.content: You collected a bunch of food!

collected_bunch_group.content: You collected a bunch of animals for your group!

collected_bunch_material.content: You collected a bunch of material for your nest!

collected_group.content: You collected enough animals for your group!

collected_material.content: You collected enough material to build your nest!

context_bluecrab.content: Blue crabs eat lots of things, like prawns and small fish.

context_blueheron.content: Blue herons eat many small animals, like dragonflies, crabs, and lizards.

context_bluetang.content: Sometimes blue tangs swim in a group called a school.

context_budgerigar.content: Budgerigars live in groups called flocks.

context_cowbird.content: Cowbirds travel in groups called flocks.

context_crestedhawkeagle.content: Crested hawk eagles use sticks to make nests high in the trees.

context_dingo.content: Dingoes eat small animals like bilbies, mice, and rabbits.

context_flyingfrog.content: Flying frogs eat lots of insects, like cicadas and flies.

context_flyinglizard.content: Flying dragon lizards eat many insects, like cicadas and flies.

context_gibbon.content: Bornean gibbons eat lots of fruit, like figs, rambutans, and durians.

context_goshawk.content: Goshawks eat small animals like squirrels, hares, and marmots.

context_grasshopper.content: Grasshoppers eat plants like neverfail grass.

context_groundsquirrel.content: Ground squirrels eat lots of plants, like bulbs, seeds and willow leaves.

context_honeyeater.content: Honeyeaters eat sweet nectar from flowers.

context_hornbill.content: Rhino Hornbills eat many fruits, like figs and rambutans, and sometimes eat small birds.

context_killifish.content: Mangrove killifish eat smaller fish and snails.

context_lemonshark.content: Lemon sharks eat many fish, like snooks, parrotfish, and barracudas.

context_mangrovewarbler.content: Mangrove warblers make their nests out of feathers, spider webs, and twigs.

context_marmot.content: Marmots eat lots of willow leaves and worms

context_mourningcloak.content: Mourning cloak butterflies travel in groups called kaleidoscopes.

context_ptarmigan.content: Ptarmigans eat lots of plants, like willow buds and pine needles.

context_rabbit.content: Rabbits eat plants like grass, and roots and seeds underground.

context_rainbowparrotfish.content: Rainbow parrotfish live in groups called schools.

context_redcappedrobin.content: Red-capped robins build their nests out of dry grass, feathers, and spider webs.

context_redfox.content: Foxes eat small animals like rabbits, mice, and geckos.

context_snook.content: Snooks eat small fish, crabs, and prawns.

context_snowshoehare.content: Snowshoe hares eat lots of plants, like willow leaves and twigs.

context_sunbird.content: Temminck's sunbirds build their nests out of dry grass, spider webs, and feathers.

context_wedgetailedeagle.content: Wedge-Tailed Eagles eat small animals like bilbies, mice, and rabbits.

context_wolverine.content: Wolverines eat other animals like hares, marmots and ptarmigans.

easy_hard.content: Do you want this level to be easy or hard?

food_much_as_can.content: Find as much food as you can before time runs out.

game_welcome1.content: Hello, Earthling! I'm making a game about animals who live all around the world.
Can you first help  me test out the game? Then, can you try to build your own levels?

game_welcome2.content: Each animal is looking for something it needs to survive. Some animals are looking for food.
Others need to build nests for their babies, or form groups to stay safe.

group_much_as_can.content: Add as many animals to your group as you can before time runs out.

group_this_much.content: Add this many animals to your group.

material_much_as_can.content: Find as many materials for your nest as you can before time runs out.

material_this_much.content: Find this many materials for your nest.

slide_avoid.content: Use the sliders to change how many animals there are, and how fast they move.

slide_collect.content: Use the sliders to change how many there are. You can also change how fast the animals move.

slide_goal.content: Use the slider to choose how many things to collect, or how much time to play for.

spacebar_attack.content: Press the spacebar on your keyboard to attack.

spacebar_down.content: Press the spacebar on your keyboard to go down.

spacebar_jump.content: Press the spacebar on your keyboard to jump.

spacebar_start.content: Ready? Press the spacebar to start

spacebar_up.content: Press the spacebar on your keyboard to go up.

spacebar_up_down.content: Press the spacebar on your keyboard to go up or down.

tap_avoid.content: Now tap to change which animals you'll need to avoid.

tap_collect.content: Tap the bubbles to change what you'll collect.

tap_goal.content: Tap a button to choose how you want to win.

tap_up_down.content: Tap to go up or down.

try_again.content: Try again or make your own version!

which_animal.content: Which animal do you want to be?
